entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Assiniboia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:43 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Assiniboia

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.0°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 82 %

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 this morning then north 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
